mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(month, '%Y-%m-01') as month FROM learning_data WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY month DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT ld.id, ld.user_id, ld.category_id, ld.subject_name, ld.month, ld.learning_time, c.name AS category_name FROM learning_data ld JOIN categories c ON ld.category_id = c.id WHERE ld.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ld.month DESC, c.id ASC, ld.subject_name ASC

SELECT ld.id, ld.user_id, ld.category_id, ld.subject_name, ld.month, ld.learning_time, c.name AS category_name FROM learning_data ld JOIN categories c ON ld.category_id = c.id WHERE ld.user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(ld.month, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{month}, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY c.id, ld.subject_name
SELECT id FROM categories WHERE name = #{categoryName}
SELECT ld.id, ld.user_id, ld.category_id, ld.subject_name, ld.month, ld.learning_time, c.name AS category_name FROM learning_data ld JOIN categories c ON ld.category_id = c.id WHERE ld.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE learning_data SET subject_name = #{subjectName}, learning_time = #{learningTime}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO learning_data ( user_id, category_id, subject_name, month, learning_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{subjectName}, #{month}, #{learningTime} )
